title: Vanilla CSS Website
description: Create a website using pure CSS without any CSS framework. Build responsive and stylish web pages.

title: Bootstrap Front-End Project
description: Develop a front-end project using the Bootstrap framework. Utilize Bootstrap's components and grid system.

title: Tailwind CSS Design Challenge
description: Design a user interface using Tailwind CSS, a utility-first CSS framework known for its simplicity and flexibility.

title: DaisyUI Component Integration
description: Integrate components from DaisyUI into a web project to enhance the design and functionality of your website.

title: JSON Data Parsing Exercise
description: Practice parsing and manipulating JSON data in your web application using JavaScript.

title: API Integration Project
description: Integrate data from a public API into your web project. Fetch and display information from the API.

title: React Front-End Development
description: Develop a dynamic front-end using the React library. Build components and manage state in your application.

title: State Management in React
description: Implement state management solutions like Redux or Mobx in a React project and showcase their benefits.

title: Firebase Integration in Web App
description: Integrate Firebase services, including authentication and Firebase, into a web application for real-time data management.

title: CRUD Operations with MongoDB
description: Create a web application that performs CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on a MongoDB database.

title: JWT Authentication in Web App
description: Implement JWT (JSON Web Tokens) authentication in a web application to secure endpoints and user access.

title: Python Web Development Project
description: Develop a web application using Python and a web framework such as Flask or Django. Showcase your Python web development skills.

title: Web Navigation and Routing Project
description: Implement navigation and routing in a web application with multiple pages, dynamic routes, and user-friendly navigation menus.

title: Database Design and SQL Queries
description: Create a normalized database schema for a specific application and write complex SQL queries to retrieve, manipulate, and analyze data.

title: C Programming Challenge
description: Solve programming challenges and exercises using the C programming language. Demonstrate your C programming skills.

title: Algorithm Implementation Project
description: Implement a specific algorithm and analyze its time and space complexity in the context of a web project.

title: Web UI/UX Design Challenge
description: Design a user-friendly and visually appealing web interface for a specific application or website. Focus on creating an excellent user experience.

title: Web Design with HTML and CSS
description: Create visually appealing web designs using HTML and CSS, focusing on layout, typography, and aesthetics.

title: Web RESTful API Development
description: Design and build a RESTful API for a specific use case and document the API's endpoints and functionality.

title: Web Hosting and Deployment
description: Set up a web hosting environment and deploy a website or web application to a server.
